channel.title: Cant put 667/704 online. Please help
channel.description:
Hey guys....i have a problem that I still cant figure out. I have a problem with putting the server online.
1. I checked and configured my ports and its up and running.
2. Im using my no-ip.
3. I put my no-ip in the server ip string in loader.java (someone told me you need to have 127.0.0.1 for ur client....and give everyone else the no-ip client)
4. Ran source BEFORE the client
5. Keeps getting stuck at 1%.
6. The localhost seems to work fine for me...only the no-ip doesnt.
All right....just help me out here please...appreciated :P

item.title: Cant put 667/704 online. Please help
item.dc:creator: @2_drag_claws 2 drag claws
item.description:
@2_drag_claws wrote:

Have you portforwarded? and btw when you move from internet connection to internet connection the server has to be portforwarded through that again unless you have a VPS

Read full topic
